content: ***a free version of this pattern is available on the elimee designs blog 1 or on youtube 2 *** this lovely pattern is part of the mosaic in a month crochet along 3 afflink hosted by juniper and oakes showcasing the talents of eleven amazing designers at the end of this cal you ll have a beautiful and cosy mosaic blanket to enjoy whether you re enjoying this pattern as part of the cal or plan to use it within another project the final size is easy to adapt - simply change your yarn weight and/or crochet hook size adjust the number of repeats or crochet more row ***a large print version of the pattern in us and uk terms is included *** you may sell the items that you crochet by following this pattern on a small scale provided that you credit elimee designs as the pattern designer mass production is not permitted this pattern or any of its parts may not be altered reproduced distributed sold made into a video tutorial or translated without written permission from elimee designs copies can be made for personal use only please note that all pdf crochet patterns by elimee designs are non-refundable this pattern is only available in english if you would like any support whilst crocheting this pattern or to give us any feedback please contact me here or post in the elimee designs crochet pattern group on facebook 4 if you would like to sign-up to receive my weekly newsletter 5 where you ll receive freebies hear about giveaways/sales and be the first to know about new pattern launches click here 1 https //www elimeedesigns co uk/blog/adamare-diamonds-mosaic-motif-crochet-pattern 2 https //youtu be/eediscztu98 3 https //elimeedesigns--juniperandoakes thrivecart com/mosaic-in-a-month-crochetalong/663a1a739f1cf/ 4 https //www facebook com/groups/575696026789853 5 https //dashboard mailerlite com/forms/183962/69245113411307155/share
